text: I have a randomly generated string from 6 letters in this form, example:

code: A' B F2 E' B2 A2 C' D2 C D' E2 F

text: Some letters have " ' " added to them some have number "2".
What i want is to add letter "x" to every letter that is on its own.
So it would look like this:

code: A' Bx F2 E' B2 A2 C' D2 Cx D' E2 Fx

text: The trick is that it would add the "x" only to those letters that are on their own.
